thread.title: Russell Cederberg

author: Russell Cederberg
title: Russell Cederberg
text: We have had a long string of really great experiences in house sitting at home in the USA and abroad and it was all made very easy with Trusted House Sitters. The system is put together very handily and works quite well. Although it could have been a very stressful experience to fly thousands of miles to stay in the houses of complete strangers, we have had a very relaxing and lovely 4-month journey thus far. We look forward to many more great house sits in the future!
